title: PBE Questions
body:
Hello guys! So I've been wanting to play on PBE for a while now but sadly, I have no account... :( I am trying to grow an account from lvl 1 to 30 so I can turn it into a PBE account.
Questions that I haven't found an answer for on the FAQ page: Do divisions affect whether or not you're accepted on PBE?
Will an account with no reports be accepted faster on PBE?
Will you be able to switch from PBE to live servers?
Are there any factors that I have to respect in order to be accepted?
Will someone give me an account? ;-; XD{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

> [{quoted}](name=XTheMagicKnightX,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=W50Kh9TO,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-10-12T09:09:58.776+0000)
>
> Hello guys! So I&#039;ve been wanting to play on PBE for a while now but sadly, I have no account... :( I am trying to grow an account from lvl 1 to 30 so I can turn it into a PBE account.

Your main account is not "made into" a PBE account, but given the opportunity to make an account specifically for the PBE.

> Questions that I haven&#039;t found an answer for on the FAQ page: Do divisions affect whether or not you&#039;re accepted on PBE?

Divisions do not matter.  What they do look for is great interest/involvement/activity in the game.  As far as I can tell, you're more likely to get a PBE account if you play a decent amount, and act well behaved.

> Will an account with no reports be accepted faster on PBE?

Being reported occasionally is fine, but if you get punished it can seriously get in the way of your attempt to get a PBE account.

> Will you be able to switch from PBE to live servers?

They're different accounts, so you keep your live server account as well.

> Are there any factors that I have to respect in order to be accepted?

I think that getting honors makes you more likely to be accepted.  To do that, just try to be helpful and positive (not to the point where you annoy though).

> Will someone give me an account? ;-; XD{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Can't/won't give you mine, but wish you luck in getting your own! :)
Thanks! So, how much would it take to get accepted onto PBE?

I can't say for sure.
I was let on a couple years ago.  At the time though, I'd received every banner from honors, so I think they look at that a bit.  I've also talked with player support a couple times when I've had small issues (or wanted 3 rp to reach a skin), so they could also take that sorta stuff into consideration as well.
It's difficult to say exactly what they want from you.  Just try to enjoy the game as much as you can.  I know that I was absurdly into the game at the time.

Maybe once you submit a ticket to get on the PBE, if you haven't heard back in a while (6 - 12 months), send a ticket to player support asking about the status on your PBE account ticket.  It can take a while to get a PBE account though.  Two of my friends sent their PBE account tickets a good while ago, and haven't heard back.  Though they never sent follow up tickets to player support.

I myself never sent follow up tickets though, as I was fortunate enough to be accepted pretty quickly.  I think they accept people to the PBE in waves rather than a consistent trickle, but that's just my own guess.

Edit: Going to sleep now, but if you want to ask me anything else, just leave a reply.  I'll probably be able to get back to you in about 11 or 12 hours.
You do not make an account to switch to the PBE, Riot will make one for you if you are accepted. It will already be level 30.
Ik but you must have a lvl 30 acc in order to get on PBE.
